name: Verify that as a CLIENT user only the data relevant to that client is displayed in the table.
testScript:
Given :

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When :
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:

  • When viewing this page as a client user, user should not see the client column and also should be able to see the worker profile related to client logged as only. In this case multiple rows for the same worker will not show.

name: Verify basic functionality when logged in as a CLIENT and as a NEUVEN user on the Direct Bank Work page. (Filter/advanced search)
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission

  • OR

  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission

When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:

  • Table to have a universal search option

    • Filters table based on Key word entered

name: Verify basic functionality when logged in as a CLIENT and as a NEUVEN user on the Direct Bank Work page. (Export)
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission
  • OR
  • Logged in as Client user with ' View Direct Bank Worker' or ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ Permission
When:
  • In Direct Bank Workers page
Then:
  • The export button will export off of the data displaying on the screen to an excel document.

name: Verify Table rule when logged in as a NEUVEN user for a a direct bank worker registered with multiple clients.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Workers’ Permission

When:

  • In Direct Bank Workers page


Then:

  • Table can have same worker  shown in multiple rows, showing a row for each client they are registered with

name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT  user ( general )
testScript:
Given : 

  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission

When :

  • Click Documents - View Worker documents

Then
  • Select  and agency from the drop down. 
  • Verify that the following columns have been added to the page. Compliant , Induction Date Column  and ACTION .

name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Compliant )
testScript:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then

  • A green tick is shown if all the mandatory documents based on the job type group for the client and default documents set for Venneu are uploaded by the agency

  •  A red 'x' is shown if one or more mandatory documents are not uploaded or if any of the uploaded mandatory documents have expired

name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Induction Date Column )
testScript:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then
The induction date column

  • Any induction date entered in the shift fulfilment page or in this page is shown in this column

  • This column is visible for users with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permission and only users with this permission can edit the data in this column

  • Date format DD/MM/YYYY

name: Verify changes to Worker documents page when logged in as a CLIENT user ( Action Column )
testScript:
Given : 
  • Logged in as a client user with View Documents permission
When :
  • Click Documents - View Worker documents
Then :

  • Action column to include an Approval tick box

    • A tick box with blue-tick shows if the worker was previously approved to work for the client in this page or in shift fulfilment page.

    • Empty tick box shown if the worker was not approved previously

    • This tick box is visible only for users with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permission and is also editable only by users with that permission

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the tabs available when creating a new direct bank worker. -User Details Tab
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • Click  ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’
  • Blank profile opens with the following tabs
    • User details
    • Permissions
    • Client locations
    • Financials
    • Compliance
    • Document Upload.
    • Notes
  • On the User Details Tab
    • Add client drop down in the first field
    • This will drop down to show all venue clients
    • User cannot multi-select from this drop down
  • When profile has been saved verify that the client selected appear in the direct bank worker table.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the tabs available when Editing a new direct bank worker. - User Details Tab
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
  • Click  Edit to change any bank worker details
  • User details tab

  • Client dropdown should be static and client name cannot be changed

  • Confirm that the changes save by saving changes and then going back into the record.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user the tabs available when CREATING / EDITING a new direct bank worker.- User Details Tab
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client User (Edit Direct Bank worker Permission)

When:

  • Direct Bank Worker page

Then:

  • Click ‘Add New Direct Bank Worker’ - 

    • Blank profile opens with different tabs

    • User details tab

    • There is no client dropdown - Instead this client field is automatically defaulted to the Top level parent client of that client user

  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker

    • User details tab

    • any changes made save successfully. 

    • this is tested by making changes and then going back it the record to check the changes.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the options  for EDITING a direct bank workers - compliance tab passport details section
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker 
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Verify that the changes to these field save correctly.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user the options for EDITING bank workers - compliance tab passport details section
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a CLIENT user (With EDIT Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
  • When editing a Direct Bank Worker 
Then:
  • On the Compliance Tab
  • Passport details
    • Toggle – can only be seen if the user has the Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission
  • Passport expiry date field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Date of birth field – helper text to show correct DD/MM/YYYY format, and also include a calendar function (date picker)
  • Verify that the changes to these field save correctly.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new direct bank worker the default permission on the permissions tab for login via app or website.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:

  • Permissions Tab

    • There will be options for the following logins. 

      • Log in Via Venneu App (Default)

      • Log in Via Venneu Desktop Site

  • When setting up a Direct bank worker ‘Log in Via Venneu App’ permission is ticked by default. 

  • The “Log in via Venneu Desktop Site” is not ticked

name: Verify as a Client User when creating a new direct bank worker the default permission on the permissions tab for login via app or website.
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:

  • Permissions Tab

    • There will be options for the following logins. 

      • Log in Via Venneu App (Default)

      • Log in Via Venneu Desktop Site

  • When setting up a Direct bank worker ‘Log in Via Venneu App’ permission is ticked by default. 

  • The “Log in via Venneu Desktop Site” is not ticked

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the PSNI  and access NI fields in the compliance tab are available
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details

These are shown below DBS details

  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)

  • PSNI Expiry date 

    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY

    • Date Picker

  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)

  • Access NI Expiry Date

    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY

    • Date Picker

Rules:

  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify as a CLIENT User the PSNI and access NI fields in the compliance tab are available doesn't save with past expiry dates.
testScript:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details
These are shown below DBS details
  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • If there is a expiry date that is in the past then the user should be given an error and it should possibly not allow them to save. 
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN user the PSNI  and access NI fields in the compliance tab are available doesn't  save with past expiry dates.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details
These are shown below DBS details
  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • If there is a expiry date that is in the past then the user should be given an error and it should possibly not allow them to save. 
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify as a CLIENT User the PSNI and access NI fields in the compliance tab
testScript:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
There are input fields for PSNI Details and Access NI Details
These are shown below DBS details
  • PSNI Number (Free Type text box)
  • PSNI Expiry date 
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
    • Helper text with date format DD/MM/YYYY
    • Date Picker
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN  user The PSNI and Access NI fields can be edited.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab when editing an existing worker the following fields can be edited .
  • PSNI Number 
  • PSNI Expiry date
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify as a CLIENT user The PSNI and Access NI fields can be edited.
testScript:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab when editing an existing worker the following fields can be edited .
  • PSNI Number 
  • PSNI Expiry date
  • Access NI Certificate Number (Free Type text box)
  • Access NI Expiry Date
Rules:
  1. These fields will be enabled if the worker is linked to a client location in Ireland otherwise greyed out.

name: Verify the spelling on country of license has been corrected on the page RTW section on the compliance tab for direct bank workers
testScript:
Given:

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

  • OR

  • Client user

When:
  • On direct workers page when adding a new direct worker profile/ editing a direct worker.
Then:
  • The country of license label has had its spelling corrected
  • from country of licence.
  • to county of license.

name: Verify as a NEUVEN User that they can see / use the update compliance button on the Compliance Tab
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged in as a Neuven user (With Manage Direct Bank Workers Permission)
When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab

  • There is a  Compliance Button at  the bottom of page in Compliance tab

  • Saves Details entered or changed within the compliance tab to the worker profile

  • Is to be seen or clickable only by users with above permission

name: Verify as a CLIENT User that they can see / use the update compliance button on the Compliance Tab
testScript:
Given:

  • Client user with ' Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission'

When:
  • Direct Bank Worker page
Then:
On the Compliance Tab
  • There is a  Compliance Button at  the bottom of page in Compliance tab
  • Saves Details entered or changed within the compliance tab to the worker profile
  • Is to be seen or clickable only by users with above permission

name: Verify as a NEUVEN User that the DBS details on the Compliance tab appear below the RTW details.
testScript:
Given: 

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank worker Permission'

When :
  • One direct Bank Workers Page
  • When adding a  New Direct Bank worker
Then:

  • One the Compliance Tab

    • DBS Details 

      • DBS Certificate Verified Toggle

      • DBS Certificate Verified By (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Certificate Verified On (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

      • DBS Certificate Number (Free Type Text field)

      • DBS Issue Date (Helper text with Date format DD/MM/YYYY)

        • Date picker

  • These fields are editable by users with above permission only
